Highly contagious coronavirus variant spreading in Northern California

The highly infectious BA.4 and BA.5 sub-lineages of the omicron coronavirus variant made up 6.1% of cases sequenced in Yolo County last week, up from 0.9% for the week ending May 14, according to data collected by researchers at UC Davis.
